name: @phs-santos/sipjs-simple
description: Abstração simplificada do SIP.js para projetos WebRTC.

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m 'chore(release): bump version to %s'
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -m 'chore(release): bump version to %s'
scripts.version:major: npm version major -m 'chore(release): bump version to %s'
scripts.version:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta -m 'chore(release): bump beta version to %s'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm publish --access public
